DataElement.preferredName: Substance Abuse Substance-Related Disorder Current Therapy Personal Medical History Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the participant is currently in treatment for substance abuse as part of a person's medical background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Substance Abuse Substance-Related Disorder Current Therapy Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to current therapy (an indicator that a person is currently being treated for the same condition) for a substance-related disorder (a category of psychiatric disorders which include disorders related to the taking of a drug of abuse, including alcohol, prescribed medications and recreational drugs) and the social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems as part of a person's medical background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems.

Concepts.definition: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems.

Property.preferredName: Substance-Related Disorder Current Therapy Personal Medical History
Property.preferredDefinition: A category of psychiatric disorders which include disorders related to the taking of a drug of abuse (including alcohol, prescribed medications and recreational drugs).:The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A category of psychiatric disorders which include disorders related to the taking of a drug of abuse (including alcohol, prescribed medications and recreational drugs).
The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
